main.name: Hannah
main.bio: Hello! I'm a final year Software Engineering student at the University of New South Wales. As a UNSW Co-op Scholar, I have undertaken internships with Atlassian and Optus, and CBA. Most recently, I completed a summer internship at Canva as frontend engineer. At university, I was the President of the UNSW Co-op Society, and travelled to India under the New Colombo Plan Mobility Grant. In my spare time, I love to play Ultimate Frisbee and basketball, read and write, and play music. Currently, I am undertaking the UNSW Web Front-End Programming course, COMP6080. I was also recently selected into the 2021 cohort of the prestigious Westpac Asian Exchange Scholarship program. I hope to undertake my exchange program in China in 2022.
main.contactmessage: Here is where you should write your message to readers to have them get in contact with you.

resume.skillmessage: Here you can create a short write-up of your skills to show off to employers

education.description: UNSW Co-op Scholar, President of UNSW Co-op Society, UNSW Burgundian Consort, UNSW Orchestra, CSESoc DevOps Subcommittee, UNSW Ultimate Club.
99.80 ATAR, 3rd in NSW in Information Process Technology (IPT) - Top Achievers List, School Prefect, String Ensemble Concertmaster (First Violin).

work.title: Fronted Engineer Intern
work.description: Completed a 3 month internship with Canva as a frontend engineer working on Presentations in Canva. Check out the new magic shortcuts available!

work.title: Mobile iOS Engineer Intern
work.description: Completed a 6 month internship with CBA as a mobile frontend iOS Engineer working on the CommBank app.

work.title: Software Developer Intern
work.description: Completed a 6 month internship with Atlassian, and continued on as a junior developer. Frontend product development on Atlassian's flagship product, Jira Software using Javascript/React and CSS.

work.title: DevOps Engineer Intern
work.description: Completed a 6 month placement at Optus, in the Cloud and Containers team. Working closely with the RedHat OpenShift Platform to provide support to internal Optus teams who are utilising cloud and container services.

work.title: English and Maths
work.description: Specialised one-on-one tutoring of high school level English and Mathematics.
